Articles.Content:
We have several Kerbal EDU licences we use to run programs in our library. For some reason, EDU is stuck in 1.4.1. It would be really good to have it updated to be inline with standard KSP and also allow us to add DLCs.

Failing that, the next best thing would be to simply be able to convert our EDU licences to standard KSP so we could update.
The EDU version is based on original KSP, but is not made or maintained by Squad. You'd do best to contact those people directly.
